pkgmetadata.longdescription: Soft Maximin Estimation for Large Scale Heterogeneous Data // Efficient procedure for solving the soft maximin problem for large scale heterogeneous data, see Lund, Mogensen and Hansen (2022) doi:10.1111/sjos.12580. Currently Lasso and SCAD penalized estimation is implemented. Note this package subsumes and replaces the SMMA package.
